author: Special Correspondent
text:
Underground drainage work in the town is being executed in full swing and is nearing completion. The work, being executed by the Tamil Nadu Water Supply and Drainage (TWAD) Board, at an estimate of Rs.79.31 crore, provides the facility for Nagapattinam in three packages.

Two sewage treatment plants have been set up with a capacity of 9.63 million litres a day at Kottaivasal in Nagapattinam.
title: Drainage work nearing completion
